dependencies.description:
GNU Make is a tool which controls the generation of executables and
other non-source files of a program from the program's source files.
dependencies.name: gmake

dependencies.description:
The GNU config.guess and config.sub scripts versioned by timestamp.
This package can be used as a build dependency for autotools packages
that ship a tarball with outdated config.guess and config.sub files.
dependencies.name: gnuconfig

dependencies.description: IBM MPI implementation from Spectrum MPI.
dependencies.name: mpi

dependencies.description:
A portable and efficient C programming interface (API) to determine the
call-chain of a program.
dependencies.name: unwind

variants.description: Enable GNU binutils libbfd for source lookup
variants.name: bfd

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system

variants.description: Specify number of internal stack frames
variants.name: internal_stackdepth

variants.description: Set number of command line arguments in report
variants.name: maxargs

variants.description: Use setjmp to generate stack trace
variants.name: setjmp
